page.description: List the contents of a server directory.
page.prototype: .ListDirectory as L (BYREF Listing as C, SFTPPath as C [, GetDetails as L = .t.])

argument.name: Listing
argument.description: The contents of the directory listing returned.

argument.name: SFTPPath
argument.description: The path to the directory on the server that you would like a directory of.

argument.name: GetDetails
argument.description: This value defaults to .t. If the value is set to .t., a detailed directory listing will be returned. If you set the value to false, only file and director names will be included and the system directories "." and ".." will be removed from the list.

return.name: result
return.description: Returns *[xb:.t.]* if the operation succeed. Otherwise, returns *[xb:.f.]*. If an error occurred, the *[xb:INET::SFTP CallResult]* property will contain more information.

page.example:
dim ftp as INET::SFTP sftp.UserName = "Fred" sftp.Password = "Secret" sftp.ServerHost = "ftp.myserver.com"
dim Listing as C
if sftp.ListDirectory(Listing, "/downloads") <> .t. ' error msg = sftp.callResult.error ... end if
